title: Riot points for a champion on accident w/o any refund tokens
body: Is there anyway I can ask riot for my 585 riot points back. i bought the riot points for specific skins I wanted. Went to buy Jax with IP and apparently i messed up and used RP instead. Please help me figure out what to do.

replies.body: Each account is provided[ 3 refund tokens](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ) or mistakes, so this would be a great time to use that.  Do you have enough currency to unlock Jax for IP?  We can look into other possibilities as well, so hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can take a look.  We'll try and figure something out!

i remeber at one point of time you didn't have enough people to run RIOT games and the "will draw for RP was out" and now you have a team, for billing.

I definitely had enough IP at the time to purchase IP. I literally just fat fingered the wrong button and didn't even notice till after I played in him in a bot game and after went to buy the skin I wanted. I don't have any refund tokens left, I used them on some other stuff and I'm actually pretty salty about this cause I did try to message Riot Games about this and they basically said tough luck.

"Hey again,

Unfortunately I'm not able to make exceptions. I'm sorry to be the bearer of bad news :(

Let me know if there is anything else I can help you with.

Bombadil
Riot Games Player Support"

Do you happen to know if getting more tokens (like 3 per season, or even like 1 per season) has been discussed recently?
I know the idea pops up on the boards from time to time and tends to be fairly well received by players. I was just wondering if it's a talking point at Riot meetings.
